item.title: Taylor Swift - Christmas Tree Farm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords Used: Am, Bdim7, C, Fmaj7, G, Cmaj7, D7, F, Em, Dm
As performed by Taylor Swift
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/1XBQCLV-hUI
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/t/taylor-swift/christmas-tree-farm/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Taylor Swift - Lover
item.description:
For educational use. Written with chord names and lyrics so that any non-transposing instrument can play along. Key G.
Chords Used: G, D, C, Em, F, Am
As performed by Taylor Swift
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/EV2ie1gNDQs
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Background (modified to look like Taylor Swift's "Lover" album cover) is from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Taylor Swift - ME!
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Me! on the ukulele by Taylor Swift and Brendon Urie. The chords used are C Am F G.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos

item.title: Taylor Swift - Mean
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Mean on the ukulele by Taylor Swift. The chords used are F C Bb Dm.
*Mute - lightly touch strings without pushing them down and strum
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Taylor Swift - Shake It Off
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Taylor Swift.
This version is slightly modified from a play along by Dr. Jill Reese (https://youtu.be/U83hQHfELNg). I wanted to use the colored strings that match KIDS/DR Multi-Color strings, and threw in the color “boxes” that represent the color chords on Kala’s new Color Chord Ukuleles. I also took out Taylor Swift’s spoken part in the middle of the song...I generally want to keep my students playing rather than sitting and waiting or using the ukuleles as a drum.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
The colored font matches Aquila KIDS and DR Multi-Color ukulele strings.
This version matches the educational Color Chord approach and uses four chords: C (red sticker), G (green stickers), F (yellow stickers) and Am (blue sticker).
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Taylor Swift - 22
item.description:

CHORDS USED: G, C, D
